src:
和五月天阿信「撞臉」　胡瓜妙回：怎麼不找我當演唱會當嘉賓？
01 Nov 2019, 05:29 by 張詠淇
民視網路娛樂節目《娛樂超skr》本週邀請到PTT網友封為「演藝圈傳奇」的綜藝大哥胡瓜，難得上網路節目的胡瓜來到《娛樂超skr》，讓主持人小路、阿甘都說今天應該要「跪著錄影」，因為從兩人從二十幾歲進入節目幕後工作，陸續都有跟瓜哥合作，也學習到很多，主持人小路、阿甘不忘搞笑說自己是「從小看瓜哥長大的」。
節目中提到最近PTT網友討論最多不間斷的，關於胡瓜與五月天阿信「長得很像撞臉」的討論串，還有網友問：「常常有人說『外型跟五月天阿信長得很像，會生氣嗎？』」針對這熱烈討論的話題，胡瓜難得首次回應網友說：「覺得與有榮焉啦！」還直誇阿信是成功的音樂家、企業家，也是很有愛心的慈善家，每次演唱會場次與規模都這麼驚人。
但胡瓜話鋒一轉，認為這樣一直「謠傳」下去不是辦法，阿信本人一直也會覺得困惑，也怕五月天粉絲生氣怎麼拿阿信跟胡瓜比，因此胡瓜搞笑說不然「事則圓滿」，最圓滿的方法就是「開了這麼多場演唱會，怎麼不找我當嘉賓？」還笑稱「等我開演唱會，我也找五月天當嘉賓啊！」
主持人小路、阿甘驚呼，表示很期待升降台同時站著瓜哥與阿信，還說今年年底五月天就有巡迴演唱會，胡瓜更幽默妙回：「年底工作滿檔來不及準備歌曲啦！」胡瓜天王搞笑功力全開，讓現場笑聲連連，展現大氣度獨家在《娛樂超skr》給PTT網友滿意的答案。
胡瓜還被PTT網友犀利提問：「兒子安安勇闖演藝圈，瓜哥有沒有當靠山？」胡瓜認為只要是星二代都會面臨這樣的質疑，能讓喜愛演戲的兒子初次亮相就被提名入圍，他很感謝大家、更感謝評審，還期許下次能和已經出道10年的女兒小禎一起走星光紅毯，綜藝大哥難得對兒女展現感性又溫柔的一面，讓人感動。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 05:27
text:
And Mayday Ashin "faces face" Hugua Miao back: Why not find me as a concert as a guest?
01 Nov 2019, 05:29 by Zhang Yiqi
The popular entertainment online entertainment program "Entertainment Super Skr" invited PTT netizens to be the variety show cousin of "The Legend of the Performing Arts Circle" this week. It is rare for the courgettes on the Internet to come to "Entertainment Super Skr", let the host Xiaolu, A-Gump They all said that they should "slap the video" today, because they have been working behind the scenes from the 20s in their twenties, and they have cooperated with me and have learned a lot. The host Xiaolu, A-Gump does not forget to say that he is "I grew up watching me grow up."
The program mentioned that PTT users recently discussed the most uninterrupted discussion. On the discussion thread of the courgette and Mayday Ashin, "Let's look like a face," some netizens asked: "Some people often say that the appearance looks very similar to the Mayday Ashin. "Is it angry?"" For this heated discussion, it is rare for me to respond to netizens for the first time: "I feel so proud!" I also praised Ashin as a successful musician, entrepreneur, and charity. Home, every concert and scale is so amazing.
However, the squash has turned around and thinks that this has been a "rumor". This is not a way. Ashin himself has always been confused. He is also afraid that the fans in Mayday will be angry with Ashin and the cucurbits. Therefore, the squash is funny or "the things are perfect". The perfect way is to "open so many concerts, why don't you find me as a guest?" He also said with a smile, "When I open a concert, I also look for a Mayday guest!"
The host Xiaolu, A-Gump exclaimed, said that he was very much looking forward to the platform and Gua Ge and Axin at the same time. He also said that there will be a concert tour in May of the end of this year. Hugua is more humorous and beautiful: "The end of the year is too late to prepare songs! Huguatian's funny skills are fully open, letting the scene laughter again and again, showing the atmosphere of the exclusive "Entertainment Super Skr" to PTT users satisfied with the answer.
The cucurbit has also been sharply questioned by PTT netizens: "Is the son An An brave in the entertainment circle, does Gua Ge have a backing?" Hu Gu believes that as long as it is the second generation of the star, it will face such doubts, and the son who loves acting will be nominated for the first time. He is very grateful to everyone, and even more grateful to the judges. He also hopes that next time he will go to the red carpet with the daughter Xiao Xiao who has been debuting for 10 years. It is rare for the big brother to show his emotional and gentle side to the children.
Update time|2019.11.01 05:27
